title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4627 - Appeals To The Gaming Commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4627 - Appeals To The Gaming Commission

State Regulations
§ 4627.1 - Filing of notice of appeal
§ 4627.2 - Contents of notice
§ 4627.3 - Forwarding of original notice to commission
§ 4627.4 - Filing of a statement of appeal
§ 4627.5 - Contents of statement
§ 4627.6 - Content and filing of counterstatement
§ 4627.7 - Proofs annexed to counterstatement
§ 4627.8 - How papers may be filed
§ 4627.9 - Notice of hearing
§ 4627.10 - Cross-examination of affiant
§ 4627.11 - Additional testimony may be allowed
§ 4627.12 - Subpoenas
§ 4627.13 - Stenographic record of proceedings
§ 4627.14 - Adjournment of hearing
§ 4627.15 - Conduct of appeal hearing
§ 4627.16 - Recording determination of appeal
§ 4627.17 - Assistance of counsel
§ 4627.18 - Authority of person acting in representative capacity
§ 4627.19 - Stay without court order

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4627

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, §435; General Municipal Law, art. 14-H; L. 1976, ch. 960

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
